summary: Frontend testing completed for Fear Meter Advanced Calibration Mode and Haptic Feedback features. All requested features verified and working correctly: Side menu shows Calibration, Advanced Calibration, and Haptic Feedback toggle. Advanced Calibration displays 4 modes (REST, EXERCISE, STRESS, FEAR) with proper prerequisite warnings. REST mode calibration works with progress ring and BPM display. After REST calibration, other modes become enabled. Haptic toggle switches between ON/OFF states correctly. Navigation between pages works properly.
critical_code_review_comments: AdvancedCalibration.jsx properly implements 4 calibration modes with correct prerequisite logic
useHapticFeedback.js hook correctly uses navigator.vibrate API with various patterns
SideMenu.jsx properly integrates Advanced Calibration and Haptic toggle options
SettingsContext.jsx correctly manages hapticEnabled state with localStorage persistence
FearMeterApp.jsx properly integrates haptic feedback with BPM sync during active sessions
context_for_next_testing_agent: Advanced Calibration Mode and Haptic Feedback features fully implemented and tested. All biometric data is MOCKED/SIMULATED - no real backend. Haptic vibration only works on devices supporting navigator.vibrate (mainly mobile devices).

features_tested.side_menu_calibration_option: PASS - Calibration option visible in side menu
features_tested.side_menu_advanced_calibration_option: PASS - Advanced Calibration option visible in side menu
features_tested.side_menu_haptic_toggle: PASS - Haptic Feedback toggle visible with ON/OFF indicator
features_tested.haptic_toggle_functionality: PASS - Toggle switches between ON and OFF correctly
features_tested.advanced_calibration_opens: PASS - Advanced Calibration screen opens from menu
features_tested.advanced_calibration_4_modes: PASS - Shows REST, EXERCISE, STRESS, FEAR modes
features_tested.rest_mode_required_warning: PASS - EXERCISE, STRESS, FEAR show 'Rest mode required first' warning
features_tested.rest_mode_calibration_start: PASS - REST mode starts calibration with progress ring and BPM
features_tested.rest_mode_calibration_complete: PASS - Shows MODE CALIBRATED with AVG BPM, MIN/MAX values
features_tested.other_modes_enabled_after_rest: PASS - EXERCISE, STRESS, FEAR enabled after REST calibration
features_tested.navigation_watch_mode: PASS - Navigation to Watch Mode works
features_tested.navigation_fear_library: PASS - Navigation to Fear Library works
features_tested.navigation_monitor: PASS - Navigation back to Monitor works

mocked_apis.note: All biometric and fear data is SIMULATED - no real APIs
mocked_apis.bpm_simulation: MOCKED - Values simulated in calibration components
mocked_apis.haptic_feedback: MOCKED - Uses browser navigator.vibrate API (only works on supported devices)
mocked_apis.calibration_data: MOCKED - Stored in localStorage, not persisted to backend
